features: USE CASE: Reach for these fan-favorites when you want the legendary comfort of a Tommie Copper face mask with the added versatility of an optional filter pocket. Easy filter integration, premium fabrics, and a tailored fit.

ALL-DAY COMFORT: Soft cotton blend lining is comfortable and gentle against sensitive skin, while 4D stretch fabric ensures a lightweight and flexible feel. Featuring a fully customizable fit thanks to the moldable nose wire, adjustable rear cinch strap, and hide-away stretch ear loops.
ODOR CONTROL: Patented Copper Znergy fabric technology provides increased odor control. It's 100% infused into all of our garments and won't wash out.
WICKING & BREATHABLE FABRIC: Designed to wick sweat and breathe well, so you stay dry and comfortable throughout the day.
body.description: In response to these unprecedented times and the recommendation to wear face coverings, Tommie Copper mobilized to create our first ever Community Wear Face Mask. These new masks feature our 4D stretch fabric known for its comfort, moisture-wicking and patented Copper Znergy technology. Adjustable straps and nose piece designed for optimal comfort. The Community Wear Face Mask is reusable and machine washable so you can keep it clean and keep it on! To ensure proper use of a mask, keep your nose covered and mask below your chin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Review of My Tommie Copper Face Mask . . . March 4, 2022 . . . Update June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have read a few reviews about these masks, and I was apprehensive about buying them because there was conflicting points-of-view. One person said that there were “no pockets” and another said that there were. To set the record straight, these masks do have a pocket for a 2.5 PM filter (see pictures).First impressions: they are all built as described. The seams, stitches are impeccable, have no loose strands anywhere on them, material feels smooth to the touch, fitment conforms to my face and nose very well. The whole design is meticulous, every detail from the elastic straps around the ears, the conformity of the shape to fit the face, to the pocket for the filter.I am wearing my mask as I am writing this article. Typically, the only time that I notice is when I inhale, the reason for this has to do with the flexing of the material; when I breathe in, this tells me that the mask's outer edges are sealing against my face to prevent leakage. I like that! Now, when I breathe out, I can feel my breath gently blowing through and out of the top near my nose, but closes again when I breathe in. My glasses get slightly foggy, but it's not bad. Finally, the ear straps are quite comfortable and don't hurt my ears. But, I worry about losing the rubber ear-strap stops; because I have lost these on other masks that I have owned.Of course, at this time, I don't have my 2.5 PM filter to test them, but I will get them soon.Overall, It is a pleasant experience to wear a mask that feels so comfortable that I forget I am wearing it. In addition, I feel confident that this mask will protect me, knowing it has copper woven into the material and a filter. (Filter must be purchased separately.)Update: Tuesday, June 14, 2022I have not lost the stops for ear straps! Yea! Usually, by this time I would have, but for some reason they stay on the string though they do move once in a while and need to be readjusted, but that doesn't bother me. So Far, so good. These masks are wonderful and work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I hope I never have to wear one again!
reviews.reviewText: These masks were comfortable to wear all day and easy to wash. I hope the world never has to experience an event like that again. Now that I no longer need them, I will probably hang on to them as a reminder of that terrible time in history.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These masks are wonderful. Great fit, because they are adjustable and very durable.After each use, I place them in the washing machine, and afterwards I let them air dry (I don’t place them in the dryer) that way they don’t shrink.These masks are far better than the paper throwaways, and I’m saving money by the unlimited reuse, because I can simply place them in the washing machine to clean them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best Fitting Masks
reviews.reviewText: These are NOT the Tommie Copper masks w the FILTER SLEEVE. I like those better (the plastic frame I use fits in there). These are otherwise cut the same, and fit well at all points. The ear loops are adjustable, durable stretch fabric that's better than what's on most masks. These are very comfortable w good breathability. I've used all types, n many brands, of mask- Tommie Copper fit the best.

reviews.reviewText: Recipient finds this mask to be a good size and very comfortable.

reviews.reviewerName: Do not like them to small know what I thought on the photo .

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safety and quality .
reviews.reviewText: They are a wonderful product . I being use it for a long time . I love it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable mask I've tried
reviews.reviewText: I'm a bit of a bigger person (6'5", 250lbs) and have found that many masks are a bit too tight for my head. This mask (adjustable sizes) not only fits me but the design of the chin part keeps it in place even if you're talking. I've worn these on multiple trans-Atlantic flights and was comfortable. They are washable and have replaceable filters, which is also a bonus. I've purchased these more than once and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice facemask
reviews.reviewText: Love the product but don’t like what they said when they say that they left it in the mailbox they did not. They put it down on my front porch in front of my steps where anyone walking by or driving by could have seen it and taken it, they did not put it in my mailbox.
One of the few face masks that I can wear while doing physical work.

I specifically wanted these masks because they were reviewed as having the best fit for eyeglass wearers, i.e. the glasses wouldn't fog up. But I am still having trouble with them. The mask is great without glasses, no problem there. But I have to fiddle with them to try to get it just right each time I wear them with glasses. Slightly disappointing.
